name: BeeMan Adventure!
description:
Welcome to BeeMan Adventure! In this redesign of a classic arcade game, you play BeeMan, a lone bee on a covert mission to steal all of the honey away from the evil Snailors and restore the Bee Kingdom to glory! Will you be the one to save the Kingdom, or will you perish at the hands of the evil Snailor Army?

*This game was made for educational purposes. It is made by students who are new/have little experience in Unity, and the game is made to fit requirements for a final project. It is one of the first games this group has made together, we hope you enjoy!*
